## Descriptive Statistics

### Population Statistics Summary


::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


Table: Descriptive Statistics for Daily Population Counts

|population |  Mean| Median|    SD| Min| Max|
|:----------|-----:|------:|-----:|---:|---:|
|total      | 95.90|     96| 10.34|  64| 130|
|colonized  | 34.13|     34|  7.41|   8|  60|
|detected   | 20.36|     20|  5.10|   4|  39|
|isolated   | 21.21|     22|  5.26|   6|  42|


:::
:::


### Correlation Analysis


::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


Table: Correlation Matrix of Population Types

|          |Variable  | total| colonized| detected| isolated|
|:---------|:---------|-----:|---------:|--------:|--------:|
|total     |total     | 1.000|     0.593|    0.534|    0.533|
|colonized |colonized | 0.593|     1.000|    0.634|    0.632|
|detected  |detected  | 0.534|     0.634|    1.000|    0.984|
|isolated  |isolated  | 0.533|     0.632|    0.984|    1.000|


:::
:::
